Les Deus, is a natural corner where there are springs of water, a visitable grotto, an adventure park and a restaurant bar. From the front there are routes to do on foot or by mountain bike, the Camí del riu stands out. It also has a very interesting festive heritage: Carnivals, Fiesta Mayor or the Matadegolla fair. The area, which is part of the RV Penedès network, along with 11 other areas, is free with potable water supply and gray and black water drainage. 12 points that bring you closer to the essence of Penedès.

A little further down, between the playground and the skate park, there is also a drinking water point. We spent the night very quietly, with no height restrictions, no shade or servants but with the peace of sleeping at the foot of Montserrat mountain. A pleasure that we will definitely repeat. My AC of 7.40 meters and 3.20 meters high. GREAT.

name: Les Valls Bessones
title: (08736) Les Valls Bessones
description: Set amidst rural bliss,PHONE AHEAD re availability....Surrounded by vineyards with majestic views and no neighbours pleasant walks,You will find three hectares of paradise. Our land is located near Guardiola de Font-Rubi, about 45 minutes by car from Barcelona. A quiet place where you can retreat and find total relaxation. We are currently still under construction, but we offer a beautiful natural place where you can meet.we are growing veg/ small holding There will soon be swimming pool on site which will soon be operating on a fully ecological system where the water is filtered by plants, without the use of chemicals. We plan to finish this year . care must be taken with children / dog we have sheep and chickens and work in progress, Bonfires are possible (season permitting).

title: (08199) Monestir de Montserrat - Unnamed Road
description:
Montserrat is interesting in two points of view, it is a sumptuous monastery located in a natural park composed of quite spectacular mountains.
Vast parking with beautiful views. The guards propose to approach their building at the end of the day in the parking lot (very flat) once they have left, in order to provide us with better protection. ("In case of problem, you honk and intervene ...").

title: (08783) Masquefa - 28 Carrer Gironès
description: Large municipal parking lot, flat, quiet, in the center of town where you can easily access shops, parks, medical services, near gas stations ... it is next to some schools so during school time there may be some influx in the rush hours of entry and exit. A 3 min walk next to the ambulatory there is a large park that in summer is very good because there are water jets where you can cool off, very cool.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road

I am a WSET wine expert and I offer wine tastings so you can learn more about wine and this beautiful area. Visit my website for more information ☺️

title_short: (43420) Santa Coloma de Queralt - 68 Carrer Llorac

title: (08737) Torrelles de Foix - 23 Calle Antonio Gaudi
title_short: (08737) Torrelles de Foix - 23 Calle Antonio Gaudi
description: RV Zone PENEDES - Torrelles de Foix [ESP] Public area in a peaceful village of Penedès. These are surrounded by surprising natural nooks: the Dous, the "Gorges" of Foix or the Sanctuary of Foix. The latter offers a spectacular view of the plain of Penedès to the sea. They leave different routes to discover the surroundings on foot or by bike. The area, which is part of the RV Penedès network, with 11 other areas, is free of drinking water supply and drainage of gray and black water. 12 points that bring you closer to the essence of Penedès.

The area, which is part of the RV Penedès network, along with 11 other areas, is free to supply drinking water and to drain gray and black water. 12 points that bring you closer to the essence of Penedès.
